languages.text: "Леди Моллес-Секандас, принявшая бразды правления семейным делом, была уличена в сговоре с пиратскими капитанами, поставлявшими ей пленников на трупный крахмал. Перед казнью она созналась в том, что передала династии фон Валанциус значительную сумму за содействие на суде".

"Lady Molles-Secundas, who had taken over the reins of her family enterprise, was found guilty of conspiring with the pirate captains who were her suppliers of captives used to make corpse starch. Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."
languages.original_text: "Леди Моллес-Секандас, принявшая бразды правления семейным делом, была уличена в сговоре с пиратскими капитанами, поставлявшими ей пленников на трупный крахмал. Перед казнью она созналась в том, что передала династии фон Валанциус значительную сумму за содействие на суде".

Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

"Lady Molles-Secundas, who had taken over the reins of her family enterprise, was found guilty of conspiring with the pirate captains who were her suppliers of captives used to make corpse starch. Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

languages.text: "Lady Molles-Secundas, die die Führung ihres Familienunternehmens übernommen hatte, wurde schuldig befunden der Verschwörung mit den Piratenkapitänen, die ihr Gefangene zur Herstellung von Leichenstärke geliefert hatten. Vor ihrer Hinrichtung gestand sie, dem Haus Valancius eine beträchtliche Geldsumme für dessen Kooperation vor Gericht gezahlt zu haben."
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas, who had taken over the reins of her family enterprise, was found guilty of conspiring with the pirate captains who were her suppliers of captives used to make corpse starch. Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

traits.locale_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas, die die Führung ihres Familienunternehmens übernommen hatte, wurde schuldig befunden der Verschwörung mit den Piratenkapitänen, die ihr Gefangene zur Herstellung von Leichenstärke geliefert hatten. Vor ihrer Hinrichtung gestand sie, dem Haus Valancius eine beträchtliche Geldsumme für dessen Kooperation vor Gericht gezahlt zu haben."

languages.text: « Dame Molles-Secundas, qui avait repris son entreprise familiale, est coupable d'avoir conspiré avec les capitaines pirates lui fournissant des prisonniers pour fabriquer de la fécule de cadavre. Avant son exécution, elle a avoué avoir payé une coquette somme à la maison von Valancius pour témoigner en sa faveur devant le tribunal. »
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas, who had taken over the reins of her family enterprise, was found guilty of conspiring with the pirate captains who were her suppliers of captives used to make corpse starch. Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

traits.locale_text: « Dame Molles-Secundas, qui avait repris son entreprise familiale, est coupable d'avoir conspiré avec les capitaines pirates lui fournissant des prisonniers pour fabriquer de la fécule de cadavre. Avant son exécution, elle a avoué avoir payé une coquette somme à la maison von Valancius pour témoigner en sa faveur devant le tribunal. »

languages.text: “莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人接管了她的家族企业。事实证明，她与多名海盗合谋。这些海盗船长源源不断地为她提供俘虏，用来制造尸体淀粉。莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人在临刑前，亲口承认曾支付过冯·瓦兰修斯家族一笔可观的费用，让冯·瓦兰修斯家族在法庭上提供协助。”
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas, who had taken over the reins of her family enterprise, was found guilty of conspiring with the pirate captains who were her suppliers of captives used to make corpse starch. Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

traits.locale_text: “莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人接管了她的家族企业。事实证明，她与多名海盗合谋。这些海盗船长源源不断地为她提供俘虏，用来制造尸体淀粉。莫莱斯-塞孔达斯夫人在临刑前，亲口承认曾支付过冯·瓦兰修斯家族一笔可观的费用，让冯·瓦兰修斯家族在法庭上提供协助。”

languages.text: «Lady Molles-Secundas, que había tomado las riendas de su empresa familiar, fue declarada culpable de conspirar con los capitanes piratas que le proporcionaban a sus prisioneros para fabricar almidón de cadáveres. Antes de su ejecución, confesó haber pagado una importante cantidad de dinero a la casa von Valancius a cambio de su cooperación en el juicio».
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas, who had taken over the reins of her family enterprise, was found guilty of conspiring with the pirate captains who were her suppliers of captives used to make corpse starch. Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

traits.locale_text: «Lady Molles-Secundas, que había tomado las riendas de su empresa familiar, fue declarada culpable de conspirar con los capitanes piratas que le proporcionaban a sus prisioneros para fabricar almidón de cadáveres. Antes de su ejecución, confesó haber pagado una importante cantidad de dinero a la casa von Valancius a cambio de su cooperación en el juicio».

languages.text: 「家業を引き継いだレディ・モレス・セクンダスは、コープススターチの原料となる捕虜を供給する海賊の船長たちと共謀した罪で有罪判決を受けました。処刑前に、彼女は裁判で協力を仰ぐためにフォン・ヴァランシウス家に多額の金銭を支払ったことを自白しました」
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas, who had taken over the reins of her family enterprise, was found guilty of conspiring with the pirate captains who were her suppliers of captives used to make corpse starch. Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

traits.locale_text: 「家業を引き継いだレディ・モレス・セクンダスは、コープススターチの原料となる捕虜を供給する海賊の船長たちと共謀した罪で有罪判決を受けました。処刑前に、彼女は裁判で協力を仰ぐためにフォン・ヴァランシウス家に多額の金銭を支払ったことを自白しました」

languages.text: "İşletmenin başına geçen Leydi Molles-Secundas, ceset nişastası üretiminde kullanılan tutsakları sağlayan korsan kaptanlarla iş birliği yapmaktan suçlu bulundu. İdamından önce yüklü bir meblağı yargı sürecine müdahil olması için von Valancius Hanesi'ne ödediğini itiraf etti."
languages.original_text: "Lady Molles-Secundas, who had taken over the reins of her family enterprise, was found guilty of conspiring with the pirate captains who were her suppliers of captives used to make corpse starch. Before her execution, she confessed to having paid a sizeable sum of money to House von Valancius for its cooperation in the court."

traits.locale_text: "İşletmenin başına geçen Leydi Molles-Secundas, ceset nişastası üretiminde kullanılan tutsakları sağlayan korsan kaptanlarla işbirliği yapmakla suçlu bulundu. İdamından önce, yüklü bir meblağı yargı sürecine müdahil olması için Von Valancius Hanesi'ne ödediğini itiraf etti."
